comment: she was horrible. my professor for 1101 made me love writing again but when i took sims class she made me hate writing. she is confusing and boring. DO NOT TAKE HER.
1102 was very easy. The assignments were not complicated and you have a lot of time to prepare for the research paper. Its not a hard class at all.

She nice, but she can discuss the assignment for a paper so much it becomes confusing. She is very picky on what you need to include in your assaignment. However, I did learn a lot from this class and the assaignments are easy if you get clarification on the purpose.
Easy workload. Caring professor. Easy A if you do the work and go to class.

Professor Sims is a good teacher.She cares about her students and is willing to help.Sometime the assignments seem worthless and pointless ,but they are doable.She is a really cool lady , but the whole class is centered around a research paper.

In 1102 she is apparently a lot harder than in 1101, she gives a lot of pointless assignment and it's easy to do well on them but the research paper she probably wotn give you an A. She isn't horrible but if you can get a better teacher do so.

Dr. Sims was a great professor. There were 4 papers and a final exam that consisted of editing two previous papers to make them better. Class is mandatory but it never boring and usually we were always let out early. She is very helpful and will clear anything up for you if you ask. She also grades fairly easy.

Dr. Sims is a very knowledgeable professor, who is always willing to help her students. She is very professional and strict, but also understanding. I would love to have Dr. Sims in world literature. If you want a good professor who cares the choose Dr. Sims.
Dr. Sims is easy going, but has a certain level of expectation of her students. She grades fairly for your work and in-class participation.

Very nice and helpful. if you are having trouble just tell her and she will meet with you and gives very good feedback. attendance is mandatory but she usually lets us out early and is very concerned about her students and their grades. she puts people on the spot but it is very engaging and helpful but it helped me understand the material better.
This teacher faclitated a very successfull semester

Dr. Sims is a very nice lady. She truly cares about her students. She will help you. I liked the group discussions. Her directions on assignments are very unclear and it is hard to understand what she is asking of you. If you are good at writing (you will write ALOT) and are also good at independent studying then take her, if not then steer clear!

Dr. Sims is a good professor, but she is not the best at providing grading rubrics for papers.  Her classes were interesting, and she is big on group discussions.  She's brilliant, but the lack of grading rubric is frustrating.

Okay, here's the deal...if you don't like being put on the spot everyday then don't sign up for her. She is painfully boring and also doesn't seem very interested in teaching the subject matter. It's sad, but honestly this is the worst professor I've ever had! :(
